# Khushaank Gupta — Portfolio & Blog

> Personal website of Khushaank Gupta, a CA aspirant and finance student at Delhi University. The site showcases financial strategy work, AI-integrated research, a blog on finance and economics, and interactive financial tools.

## Owner
- Name: Khushaank Gupta
- Role: CA Aspirant & Finance Student, Delhi University
- Email: khushaankgupta@gmail.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/khushaank
- Twitter: https://x.com/Khushaankgupta

## Site Information
- URL: https://khushaankgupta.qzz.io
- Tech Stack: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Supabase (backend), Lucide Icons
- Hosting: GitHub Pages / Netlify

## Pages

### / (Homepage)
Portfolio homepage with about section, skills overview, project showcase, AI toolkit, timeline, and contact. Serves as the primary landing page.

### /blog (Financial Chronicles)
Blog listing page featuring articles on corporate tax structures, financial risk assessment, market trends, and economic analysis. Posts are fetched dynamically from Supabase.

### /ai (AI & Quantitative Finance)
Dedicated page showcasing the intersection of AI and traditional finance — includes quantitative modeling philosophy, Python automation workflows, and AI tool usage.

### /pulse/ (Article Viewer)
Dynamic article reader with table of contents, reading progress bar, focus mode, in-article search, related posts, and a comment system with Google OAuth.

### /privacy (Privacy Policy)
Standard privacy policy covering data collection, cookies, analytics, and user rights.

### /terms (Terms & Conditions)
Terms of service governing use of the website and its tools.

## Expertise Areas
- Chartered Accountancy (CA) preparation
- Corporate tax structures & GST
- Financial risk assessment & auditing
- Market volatility analysis
- AI and data science in finance
- Quantitative modeling with Python

- Contact: khushaankgupta@gmail.com
